overview: Marion Austerlitz is a stubborn person, much to the chagrin of her husband, Dr. Fritz Austerlitz.  There's constantly some kind of excitement going on in their house:  this time, Marion takes in a barking dog, much against the wishes of her husband; that time she's harrasses the old servant; then countless traffic tickets from the police come in the mail; or high bills for extravagant huts are delivered by the mailman.  Finally, Fritz blows a fuse.  In the presence of his friend, Professor Endres, and Marion's mother, a big fight breaks out between the couple.
title: Die schwache Stunde
